title: BlackBerry Aurora official product page has gone live

thread.text: Along with pre-orders for it through Dinomarket Indonesia. Looks prtty good for its intended market.https://bbmerahputih.co.id/product/aurora.phpDINOMARKET | Belanja Online Bebas Resiko BlackBerry Aurora |

The price is what really amazes me 
It's about the same price as the Blackberry Leap (when it launched) at $275 and considering we getting 4GB RAM, 32GB storage and a fairly beefy 3,000 mAh battery it's certainly worth the cash. The screen is only 720p but thats alright. Quite interested to see how this does. Hopefully it sells really well. 
What worries me is the '100% Original' and the wink face hahaha. Why wouldnt it be 100% original lol

replies.text: I think in that market... they get lots of BRANDED devices that aren't 100% original.

thread.text: It looks so nice! Really like it a lot!
